title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Educational Technology-Based Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the basic principles of HCI and educational technology application cases.
Learners can design educational UI/UX prototypes applying visual design principles (visibility, hierarchy, color theory, etc.).
Learners can evaluate digital interfaces for mathematical problem-solving using cognitive load theory and UX design techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
